"photogspassion" wrote:
> 
> What would you recommend?
> 

I can't recommend any approach without knowing anything about your
system.  The last REST system I developed for a client doesn't use any
server-side coding (i.e. PHP, Ruby) for servicing GET requests, only
.htaccess, and runs on any run-of-the-mill shared-hosting account
based on Apache < 2, with a little PHP to handle POST.  I recommend
KISS.

-Eric
